string-array.name: s01
string-array.item: you wake up. it is freezing even though you are tucked into five blankets. your prescription level alarm is blaring.

string-array.name: s02
string-array.item: you sleep for 3 more minutes before the awful alarm starts going off again. the neighbor dogs outside start barking along.

string-array.name: s03
string-array.item: you check your phone. a new message reads: URGENT - A CRITICAL DOCUMENT HAS BEEN STOLEN FROM HQ. YOUR MISSION IS TO RETRIEVE THIS DOCUMENT BEFORE IT FALLS INTO THE WRONG HANDS

string-array.name: s04
string-array.item: as soon as you respond, you receive a new message: GREAT! GRAB ANYTHING YOU MIGHT NEED AND MEET THE HELICOPTER OUTSIDE ASAP!
in a mild panic, you just grab your phone and GET INTO THE CHOPPA
luckily your go-bag is ready to go
hold on, you need to say bye to your roomies first

string-array.name: s05
string-array.item: there is literally a helicopter right outside your house. the neighbors across the street are watching intently from their cars as you hop in and the pilot takes off immediately. you ask what\'s going on and the pilot explains that the document appears to be in transit via amazon drone to an unknown location. you need to track it down.

string-array.name: s07
string-array.item: already disgruntled at being woken up at the crack of dawn by your ungodly alarm, your roomies don\'t really care that you\'re leaving. however, they hear the chopper and realize you may need supplies. one hands you a gun and the other gives you a high five.

string-array.name: end
string-array.item: you pick up the envelope. this must be the document.
